    • Uses of VisibleObject in GameObjects

      Classes in GameObjects that implement VisibleObject 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  MovableBox
      Moveable Box is a class that handles a cube-shaped maze object which can move through the level.
      class  Player
      Player represents the actual player in MazeRunner.
      class  PowerUp
      the powerup class enables us to place powerups in the game some of the methods are described below

    • Uses of VisibleObject in LevelHandling

      Classes in LevelHandling that implement VisibleObject 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  Maze
      Maze represents the maze used by MazeRunner.
      Method parameters in LevelHandling with type arguments of type VisibleObject 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void Level.addToVisible(java.util.ArrayList<VisibleObject> visibleObjects)
      the method addToVisibleObjects adds all the maze, swarm and the powerups of each level to the visible objects wich will displayed.
      void Level.removeFromVisible(java.util.ArrayList<VisibleObject> visibleObjects)
      the method removeFromVisibleObjects removes the maze, swarm and the powerups of each level from the visible objects wich will displayed.

    • Uses of VisibleObject in MazeObjects

      Classes in MazeObjects that implement VisibleObject 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  SkyBox
      The SkyBox is the mazeObject on which the surounding sky texture is projected.
